headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ and RP on Air Races and Stunt Races
content:
Competition takes all kinds of shapes nowadays: sometimes youâ€™re trading paint and sparks with other cars mid-air, while others you are threading aircraft through the eye of a needle flying them under bridges and between mountains while high above the highways and byways of Los Santos.

Either way, the adrenaline rush of all Rockstar-created Air Races and Stunt Races is accompanied by Triple Rewards this week.
